summary: This module implements a helper class that encapsulates interactions with the Qbs build system, handling the creation of Qbs project files, translating Conan configuration settings into Qbs command arguments, and invoking Qbs to resolve, build, and install projects as part of Conan's workflow.
business_intent: Enable Conan to use Qbs as a build backend, automating project setup, configuration translation, and execution of Qbs commands so that packages can be built and installed through a unified Conan interface.
